description: Analyzes historical alert log data provided via the UI, identifies trends in distress event types and frequency, calculates average response times, and generates actionable safety improvement recommendations

example_response.summary: Executive summary of the alert analysis
example_response.date_range: Date range of the analyzed data
example_response.type_distribution: Breakdown of events by distress type with counts and percentages
example_response.severity_distribution: Breakdown of events by severity level with counts and percentages
example_response.zone_analysis: Analysis of events by zone including hotspots
example_response.avg_response_time: Average response times broken down by severity and zone
example_response.trends: Identified trends and patterns in the data
example_response.recommendations: Prioritized actionable recommendations for safety improvements
